item.title: Huricane Melissa, Disaster Relief
item.description: After Hurricane Melissa, Brian messaged me on Instagram. He sells me a vision from his friend on a solution. I message them back on Whatsapp. The Problem Jamaica moves slow. We’re reactive. When disasters hit, we respond. We scramble. We do our best with incomplete information. Communities that are popular on IG and TikTok get help. Rural communities get forgotten. That’s not because Jamaicans don’t care. It’s because we lack coordination.
